addButton.description: Text for the button to add a new site

changeButton.description: Text for the button to change an existing site

donationPlea.message: If you're happy with this extension and would like to donate towards its maintenance and further development, please use the Paypal button below. Donations will allow me to develop and roll out new features, especially any that would require hosting a website.

extDesc.message: Adds keyboard navigation to various webcomics.

extIconHover.description: Mouse hover text for the Page Action

freeNotice.message: This extension is free to use.

notification.message: This site has provided a new rule for keyboard navigation. Would you like to add it?

removeButton.description: Text for the button to remove an existing site

resetButton.description: Text for the button to reset settings to defaults

resetWarning.message: This will reset all settings, including user-created site rules. Are you sure you want to continue?

saveButton.description: Text for the button to save settings

showIcon.message: Show icon in address bar when keyboard navigation is available?

siteAddError.description: Error shown if user omits a site's title or URL
siteAddError.message: Both the comic's title and its URL are required!
